 us only the tail of the lion, but I have no doubt that the lion belongs to=

e universe as it really is than to persist in delusions, however satisfying=

for what you want to find."

o: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com

far, but I am still not certain I understand it completely.
=C2=A0

t everything was based in the electromagnetic spectrum.

----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
From: Frank Ratka 
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
Sent: Monday, =
June 08, 2009 2:05 PM
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas

Tell me where the s=
eperation on the spectrum takes place between 300Hz and 300KHz. Yes, soundw=
aves cause pressure waves that our ears read as vibration and our mind tran=
slates as sound. The waves are still on the electromagnetic spectrum. Even =
subsonic geomagnetic waves are present on the scale. What I mean by power c=
an be directll translated to volume or amplitude. The only thing that disti=
nguishes soundwaves from any other wave is the fact that we can hear them.
=

Frank R.

--- On Mon, 6/8/09, Rj <rasterer@yahoo. com> wrote:


From: Rj <=
rasterer@yahoo. com>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogrou=
ps .com
Date: Monday, June 8, 2009, 2:53 PM


No. Sounds waves are not on t=
he electromagnet spectrum nor are they a form of electromagnet energy. Soun=
d waves are based on pressure waves in the air (or in other substances).=C2=
=A0 Our ears detect these pressure waves and translate them into sounds we =
here.=C2=A0 Our ear do NOT hear electromagnet energy.=C2=A0 Our eyes do: th=
at part which we call visible light.



--- On Mon, 6/8/09, Frank Ratka <wa=
rrior18eii@ yahoo.com> wrote:


From: Frank Ratka <warrior18eii@ yahoo.com>=

Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Date: Monday=
, June 8, 2009, 12:38 PM


It sounds like she's saying "one, two, ....."

A=
 mistake that a lot of people make is thinking that there are two different=
 types of energy at work when it comes to sound waves and electromagnetic w=
aves. The only thing that seperates them is frequency and power. Radio wave=
s are radio waves because they occupy a certain block of the electromagniet=
ic spectrum. Sound waves exist on that same spectrum just farther down with=
 much longer waves. Soundwaves and subsonic waves can penetrate almost anyt=
hing because of their wavelengths. The shorter the wavelength the more ways=
 we can shield against them.

Think of microwaves. These are also a type of=
 radio and telemetry transmitting wave but the waves also have a physical e=
ffect on our environment by causing molecules to speed up, which creates he=
at. A little lower than this is IR or infrared it too can cause physical ob=
jects to heat up but usually it just causes molecules to rotate in place. A=
ll physical things give off IR light. Its a way the total system conserves =
energy by spontaneously emitting IR radiation.

Frank R.

--- On Mon, 6/8/0=
9, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh ostresearch. com> wrote:


From: =
April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh ostresearch. com>
Subject: Re: [EVP-=
ITC] New ideas [3 Attachments]
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Date: Monday, J=
une 8, 2009, 2:27 PM


Here is some food for thought. I am currently review=
ing my audio from our May 30th investigation.
=C2=A0
It was me and another =
girl teammate=C2=A0present in the room. I picked up a 3rd female voice on m=
y digital voice recorder that I carry with me. We were standing right next =
to another digital video recorder that I leave beside my night vision camer=
a. That recorder did not pick up this 3rd voice. I have asked the girl that=
 was with me to check her recording to see if she picked it up.
=C2=A0
I ha=
ve long felt the true EVP does not come from sound waves in the environment=
, or then it wouldn't be EVP, but a disembodied voice. Somehow EVP's are ap=
pearing directly on the recordings.
=C2=A0
This instance with the recorders=
 may back that theory up. That other recorder should have picked that voice=
 up if it were sound waves in the environment.
=C2=A0
I am attaching the cl=
ip of this 3rd voice. The=C2=A0file that is named=C2=A0"01-02-17 Clip" is t=
he full clip.=C2=A0You will hear my voice as I say "Yeah", and then another=
 comes in right after that. I think I know what it says.
=C2=A0
Again, I wa=
s live monitoring my audio, but still did not hear this until playback. It =
isn't clear, so I am not as excited about it as my one's from the last inve=
stigation.
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
----- Original Message ----- 
From: Frank Ratka 
T=
o: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
Sent: Monday, June 08, 2009 1:09 PM
Subject: R=
e: [EVP-ITC] New ideas

I have a running theory that EVP is carried on an u=
ntrasonic wave and demodulated exactly where they want it to manifest. It w=
orks off the heterodyne principle. If you mix two ultrasonic waves that dif=
fer one another in frequency then if you add or subtract them together you =
get a beat frequency or alternate frequency. For example, if a ghost is sen=
ding a signal at 54KHz and you have an electric fan in a room creating an u=
ntrasonic frequency at 45KHz then you will have a intermediate difference=
=C2=A0frequency at 9KHz, well within human hearing range (20Hz to 20KHz). T=
his was just an example, but all electronic equipment generates ultrasonic =
signals just by turning them on. From this theory I always felt that EVP we=
re generated within a few inches of the recorder.

We are able to reproduce=
 this affect in not only radio with superheterodyne systems but also with a=
coustics and audio as in some passive sonars and a commercial produce calle=
d the "audio spotlight" by Dr. Joseph Pompeii.

Frank R.

--- On Mon, 6/8/0=
9, Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@gmail. com> wrote:


From: Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@g=
mail. com>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Da=
te: Monday, June 8, 2009, 1:56 PM


Fascinating! I've had this idea that th=
e EVP are often=C2=A0not recorded by the microphone but somehow make their =
way in at the actual=C2=A0point where the storage is made, whether it be an=
alog (tape) or digital.=C2=A0

So much we don't know ...

Zack

=C2=A0
On M=
on, Jun 8, 2009 at 1:39 PM, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh ostresea=
rch. com> wrote:




I monitor my audio live. The funny thing is that even =
so, those last EVP's I captured I did not hear either in the environment, o=
r on my recording as it happened. I only heard them upon playback.
=C2=A0
-=
---- Original Message ----- 
From: Zack Widup 
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com=
 
Sent: Monday, June 08, 2009 11:40 AM
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas

I =
am curious if anyone with a microphone wired to a remote site has ever gott=
en any EVP in real time.

I=C2=A0took part in=C2=A0an investigation of Ashm=
ore Estates, near Ashmore IL, on Saturday night. We had six video cameras s=
et up in the three halls of the building. The video for all=C2=A0was being =
monitored and recorded=C2=A0at a central location. Alas, we did not have mi=
crophones at the camera sites conected to the central location. I wonder wh=
at we might have heard if we did?

Zack

=C2=A0

5 PM, threadsintyme@ juno.com <Threadsintyme@ juno.com> wrote:

 agree to end this discussion about her...

Al

<DIV>I have a running th=
eory that EVP is carried on an untrasonic wave and demodulated exactly wher=
e they want it to manifest. It works off the heterodyne principle. If you m=
ix two ultrasonic waves that differ one another in frequency then if you ad=
d or subtract them together you get a beat frequency or alternate frequency=
. For example, if a ghost is sending a signal at 54KHz and you have an elec=
tric fan in a room creating an untrasonic frequency at 45KHz then you will =
have a intermediate difference frequency at 9KHz, well within human he=
aring range (20Hz to 20KHz). This was just an example, but all electronic e=
quipment generates ultrasonic signals just by turning them on. From this th=
eory I always felt that EVP were generated within a few inches of the recor=
der.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>We are able to reproduce this affect in n=
ot only radio with superheterodyne systems but also with acoustics and audi=
o as in some passive sonars and a commercial produce called the "audio spot=
light" by Dr. Joseph Pompeii.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Frank R.<BR><BR>=
--- On <B>Mon, 6/8/09, Zack Widup <I><w9sz.zack@gmail. com></I></B> w=
rote:<BR></DIV>

<DIV id=3Dyiv100209972>

<DIV>
<DIV>Fas=
cinating! I've had this idea that the EVP are often not recorded by th=
e microphone but somehow make their way in at the actual point where t=
he storage is made, whether it be analog (tape) or digital. <BR></DIV>=

<DIV>So much we don't know ...</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Zack</DIV>

<DIV>I am curious if anyone with a=
 microphone wired to a remote site has ever gotten any EVP in real time.</D=
IV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>I took part in an investigation of Ash=
more Estates, near Ashmore IL, on Saturday night. We had six video cameras =
set up in the three halls of the building. The video for all was being=
 monitored and recorded at a central location. Alas, we did not have m=
icrophones at the camera sites conected to the central location. I wonder w=
hat we might have heard if we did?</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
